mapper.update: update t_account_collection set V_TOTAL_MONEY = V_TOTAL_MONEY + #{V_MONEY} , V_WX_MONEY =V_WX_MONEY+#{WX_MONEY}, V_ALI_MONEY = V_ALI_MONEY + #{ALI_MONEY}, V_PAY_NUM = V_PAY_NUM + 1 where V_ACCOUNT_ID = #{V_ACCOUNT_ID}

update t_bond_today set V_LOCK_MONEY = V_LOCK_MONEY + #{V_LOCK_MONEY} , V_SURPLUS_BOND = V_SURPLUS_BOND + #{SURPLUS_BOND}, V_COUNT_RECEIVABLES = V_COUNT_RECEIVABLES + #{V_MONEY} , V_WX_RECEIVABLES =V_WX_RECEIVABLES+#{WX_MONEY}, V_ALI_RECEIVABLES = V_ALI_RECEIVABLES + #{ALI_MONEY} where V_USER_ID = #{V_USER_ID}

update t_account_show set V_PAY_NUM =V_PAY_NUM + #{V_PAY_NUM} , V_ORDER_NUM =V_ORDER_NUM + #{V_ORDER_NUM} , V_POLL_NUM =V_POLL_NUM + #{V_POLL_NUM} , V_PAY_TIME = now() where V_ACCOUNT_ID = #{V_ACCOUNT_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT sum(tot.V_MONEY) V_MONEY , tat.V_APP_NAME, sum(tct.V_MONEY) COMMISSION_MONEY, sum(tct.V_FORMALITIES) FORMALITIES_MONEY, sum(tct.V_REALITY) REALITY_MONEY,tot.V_BELONG_APP, sum(tclt.V_CASH_COLLECTION) V_CASH_COLLECTION FROM( select sum(V_MONEY) V_MONEY ,V_BELONG_APP from t_order_tab WHERE 1 = 1 AND TO_DAYS(V_CREATE_TIME) = TO_DAYS(now()) AND( V_STATUS = '1' OR V_STATUS = '3' ) GROUP BY V_BELONG_APP)tot LEFT JOIN t_app_tab tat ON tot.V_BELONG_APP = tat.ID LEFT JOIN (select SUM(V_MONEY) V_MONEY,SUM(V_FORMALITIES) V_FORMALITIES,SUM(V_REALITY) V_REALITY,V_APP_ID from t_commission_tab where V_STATUS = '1' AND TO_DAYS(V_COMMISSION_TIME) = TO_DAYS(now()) GROUP BY V_APP_ID ) tct ON tat.ID = tct.V_APP_ID LEFT JOIN T_COLLECTION_TAB tclt on tot.V_BELONG_APP = tclt.V_APP_ID GROUP BY tot.V_BELONG_APP ORDER BY tat.V_APP_NAME DESC

SELECT sum(tot.V_MONEY) V_MONEY , tsub.USER_NAME , sum(tut.V_MONEY) TOPUP_MONEY , sum(twt.V_MONEY) WITHDRAW_MONEY , sum(tbt.V_SURPLUS_BOND) V_SURPLUS_BOND FROM t_sys_user_base tsub inner JOIN t_bond_today tbt ON tbt.V_USER_ID = tsub.USER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sum(tot.V_MONEY) V_MONEY , tot.V_BELONG_USER FROM t_order_tab tot WHERE TO_DAYS(tot.V_CREATE_TIME) = TO_DAYS(now()) AND( tot.V_STATUS = '1' OR tot.V_STATUS = '3' ) GROUP BY tot.V_BELONG_USER ) tot ON tot.V_BELONG_USER = tsub.USER_ID LEFT JOIN (select SUM(V_MONEY) V_MONEY,V_TOPUP_USER from t_user_topup where V_STATUS = '1' AND TO_DAYS(V_TOPUP_TIME) = TO_DAYS(now()) GROUP BY V_TOPUP_USER) tut ON tot.V_BELONG_USER = tut.V_TOPUP_USER LEFT JOIN (select SUM(V_MONEY) V_MONEY,V_APPLY_USER from t_withdraw_tab where V_STATUS = '1' AND TO_DAYS(V_APPLY_TIME) = TO_DAYS(now()) GROUP BY V_APPLY_USER) twt ON tot.V_BELONG_USER = twt.V_APPLY_USER
GROUP BY tsub.USER_ID ORDER BY tsub.USER_NAME DESC

select tot.V_MONEY,tft.V_NAME,date_add(tot.V_CREATE_TIME, interval 10 minute) TIME_OUT, tot.V_ORDER_NO,tft.ID,tpa.V_URL_SCHEME,tpa.V_APP_ID,tot.V_VIEW_TYPE from t_order_tab tot left join t_pay_account tpa on tot.V_BELONG_ACCOUNT = tpa.ID left join t_file_tab tft on tpa.V_FILE_ID = tft.ID
tot.ID = #{ID}
